title: President condoles deaths in jeep accident in Neelum Valley
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Wednesday expressed grief over the deaths after a jeep plunged into a river in Neelum Valley of Azad Kashmir.
The president prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed souls, sympathised with the bereaved families and also prayed for strength to them to bear the loss.
According to media reports, as many as 10 people died and another three were injured when a jeep plunged into River Neelum after the driver lost control of the vehicle.
